sqlMap.select: /* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.listLayout */ SELECT LAYOUT_ID, LAYOUT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, COMMON, LAYOUT_NUM, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT ORDER BY REGIST_DATE ASC

SELECT /* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.listBySearchCondition */ (CASE tbl1.LAYOUT_ID WHEN tbl1.LAYOUT_ID THEN @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ELSE @ROWNUM := 1 END) AS NUM, tbl1.* FROM ( SELECT LAYOUT_ID, LAYOUT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, COMMON, LAYOUT_NUM, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT WHERE 1 = 1
UPPER(LAYOUT_NAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #searchWord#, '%'))
ORDER BY LAYOUT_NAME ASC
ORDER BY LAYOUT_NAME DESC
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
LIMIT #startRowIndex#, #pagePerRecord# ) tbl1, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := #startRowIndex# ) tbl2

/* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.countBySearchCondition */ SELECT COUNT(LAYOUT_ID) FROM IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT WHERE 1 = 1
UPPER(LAYOUT_NAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', #searchWord#, '%'))

/* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.listLayoutCommonCheck */ SELECT LAYOUT_ID, LAYOUT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, COMMON, LAYOUT_NUM, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT WHERE COMMON = #common# ORDER BY layout_num

/* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.getLayout */ SELECT LAYOUT_ID, LAYOUT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, COMMON, LAYOUT_NUM, REGISTER_ID, REGISTER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGIST_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT WHERE LAYOUT_ID = #layoutId#
sqlMap.update: /* [PortalLayout_SqlMap.xml] portal.admin.screen.portalLayout.updateLayout */ UPDATE IKEP4_PO_LAYOUT SET LAYOUT_NAME = #layoutName#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, LAYOUT_NUM = #layoutNum#, UPDATER_ID = #updaterId#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName#, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE LAYOUT_ID = #layoutId#
